control_attributes.control_description: The information system enforces the revocation of access authorizations resulting from changes to the security attributes of subjects and objects based on [Assignment: organization-defined rules governing the timing of revocations of access authorizations].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system provides the capability for privileged administrators to configure [Assignment: organization-defined security policy filters] to support different security policies.

Control Statement: The information system enforces the revocation of access authorizations resulting from changes to the security attributes of subjects and objects based on [Assignment: organization-defined rules governing the timing of revocations of access authorizations].
